div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiij
die mensis Septembris Anno quo Supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Jonhne of Cullane forspekar that mathow Doboir' opidan
of trailsond' hede lelelie deliuerit out of his Schip
to William Duncan Sterisman of his Schip al the Rymele
that was in the saide Schip pertening to the said' William
and he quyt of the clame of the said' William

The saide day Alexander chamer in the Schipraw was
in ane Amerciament of the Court for the wranguis' Intrometing
And Stoping' of ane hors' with j scled' with corne pertening
Isabell of Cullane Ande Jonhne of Chamer conuikit be
the said' assis' for strubulance of Watty houysone be
the moutht of William blinsel forspekar and to amend' as
law will and forber' in tyme to Cum and the saidez Isabell
and Wat was quyt of ale strubulance of the said' alexander and
Jonhne et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvijo
die mensis Septembris Anno quo Supra

The saide day Jonhne litstar deponit be his aithe at the
ordinance and deliuerance of ane Suorne assis' that he
said neuire that the woll that was in gilbert patersonnis
clath was his and the said gilbert quyt of his clame
of the saide day

Eodem die Thomas alexandersone alias beg' amerciatur per assisam Juratam
ex ore Dauid menyes prelocutoris assise pro perturbio Will Walteri
gareauche et Sponsi suj Et Idem Walterus amerciatur pro
perturbio dicti thome per eandem Et quelibet dictarum parcium alteri
emendabit ut Jura volunt
Eodem die Robertus blinsele dedit Johanni smyth v s' pro se ipso

Eodem die Walterus gareauche Inuenit forsy Dauisone plegium
legalem quod Thomas alexandersone erit Indempnis pro eo aliter
quam per viam iuris Et Idem thomas inuenit Alexandrum myrton'
plegium legalem quod Idem Walterus erit Indempnis pro eo aliter
quam per viam Juris

Robertus blinsell Dauid menyes alexander chamer Johannes Collisone Johannes Kintor
Johannes thomsone Alexander mathesone Willelmus Kintor Robertus hay
Johannes Steuinsone et alexander nachtj Jurati dicunt quod Dauid Kintor
est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Dauid Kintor auj suj

the xvij day of Septembre the yer' forsaid' gevin to Johne smyth Sangstar
at commavnd' of the tone' be Johne Colisone x s' to be allowit in his girsom'

The xvij day of September' the yer of god et cetera Nyntj and
nyne yeris It was deliuerit and ordanit be the aldirman
ande Counsale that thir personis vndir writin sal deliuer the
Stuff follouand' to be gevin in ane propyne to our Soueran
lordis hienes In the first Jonhne of Cullane and Androw Cullan
his brothir ane pip of claret wyne the price tene scottis
crovnis fyve li' Robert blinsell xxiiij halff boystis of Skor
cheatis price xxxvj s' and' Williame futhes four
pundis Stane of waxe price four' vnicornis of
gold' the quhilkis money salbe pait to the said personis
at the fest of purificacion of our lady Callit candilmes
next to Cum of the first and the rediast of the girssomes
of the landis and wattiris of this towne of the first that
Cumis in Ande of thirat avne takis and quhat vthir personis
that ples' thame to tak thar avne money of avand'
ony girssomes to the tone'

The saide day It was deliuerit be the Consale present
for the tyme that becaus' Jonhne of glenmaluyn is blynd'
decrepit ande Impotent and has bene this lang tyme
bigane and has disponit ale his movabile gudis except'
part of ayrschip of gudis and his ayr' vteuche the Realme
that his gudis of ayrschip salbe prisit In presence of the officiaris
be Suorne personis and sobirlie gevin to the expens' of the
saide Jonhne and nocht for the wasting' of the saide gudis in
preiudice of the ayr' bot alanerlie for the Sustentacion
of the saide Jonhne as efferis

The saide day Androue Cullane ande James Collisone
tua of the baillies of Abirdene chargit James leis ane of the
officiaris to pas' ande charge Jonhne stevinsone in the kingis
name and thar to cum and entir befor thame to ansuer to the
thingis that thai hade to say tile him anent the airschip of
vmquhile Williame fyvy ande the saide officiar' schew that he
passit and chargit him to entir and he denyit and wald nocht entir
as he schew to the baillies and the procuratouris of the air of vmquhil
the saide Williame askit our souerane lordis lettres fra the said
baillies execut anent the said' ayrschip for the quhilkis thai
send the said officiar' and chargit him to command' and charge the
saide Jonhne to entir befor thame quhilk passit and come
agane and schew that he had chargit the saide Jonhne to entir
befor the said baillies quhilk denyit and dissobeit him apone
the quhilkis he present a brokin wand' in takin of dissobeing'
and Alexander couper and Jonhne low deponit the gret bodely aitht
that thai by stud herd' saw and quhar witnes was w tane
quhene quhen' the said Jonhne dyssobeit the said officiar'

Curia Capitalis burgi de abirdene tenta
In pretorio eiusdem primo die mensis Octobris anno Domini millesimo
quadringentesimo nonagesimo nono

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurd miles Electus
fuit in officium prepositure pro anno Instante prestito
Solito Juramento

Eodem die Andreas Cullane senior Jacobus Colison'
Andreas Cullane Junior et Johannes mar' Electi fuerunt
In officium balliuorum pro anno Instante prestitis Solitis
Juramentis

Eodem die philippus Dunbrek Andreas nachtj
Jacobus leis et Willelmus scrimgeour' electi fuerunt
in officium seriandorum prestitis Solitis Juramentis

The saide day Johne richerdsone ayr to vmquhill
Williame of fyve resauit fra Jonhne Steuinson burges
of the said' burghe threttj Schillingis In part of pament
of the gudis of ayrschip pertening to him be deces' of the
saide Williame

Eodem die Jacobus hill fecit constituit creauit et nominavit
Johannem Cullane Dauid menyeis et Johannem Colysone coniunctim
et divisim suos legittimos procuratores ad prosequendum margaretam fechat
matrem suam et sponsum secundum tenorem littere regie prepositi et
balliuis direct' agend' defendend' promitten' de Rato et grato
in vberiore forma procuratorij promitten' et cetera cum Ceteris clausulis
necessariis et oportunis

div.head: Appreciatores Carnium
div.p:
Patricius leslie Willelmus andirsone Junior Johannes steuinsone
Willelmus murray Johannes Duncansone Johannes annand' David spens
Willelmus portar' Willelmus Kintor Johannes tulibo gilbertus rastar'
alexander myrtone Richardus litstar Johannes arthour' et Johannes portar

The saide day It was statut' and ordanit be the aldirman
balyeis Consal and Communite that nay aile be brovyn' within
this burghe fra this day viij dais furtht derrar' thane
viij d' vndir the pane of law

The saide day It was Statut' and ordanit be the aldirman
balyeis Consal and communite that the baxtaris sal baik tua penny
breid' Clene Stuf welbakin veyand' xxxij vnce and penny
breid' of quhet veyand xvj vnce vndir the pane of law

The saide day It was statut' and ordanit be the aldirman consale
and communite that the Candilmakaris mak gude and Sufficient Candill
dry and small wekit the pvnde for ij d' and ob' ane that that
thai be sellit with wecht vndir the pane of law

div.head: Gustatores ceruisie
div.p:
Evin quartar philippus seriand'
Alexander stabillar' laurencius' et Andreas badenaghe'
grene quartar James leis seriand'
Manys bellan and huchone tode
Crukit quartar
Nicholl bevmond' et Johannes quhithed'
futy quartar
Willelmus harpar et Andreas gaw

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem octauo
die mensis octobris anno quo Supra

The saide day Dauid goslyne was conuikit be ane suorne
assis' Dauid mar' forspekar for strubulance of William Colp and his
hous' and to amend' as law will and forber' in tym to Cum Ande
the said' William was conuikit for strubulance of the said Dauid
quhilk strubulance was fundin bot licht and the prouocacion of the
said strubulance begane in the said' David goslyne as was deliuerit
be the said assis' and the said' forspekar the namys of the assis' David
mar' James Kennartj Duncan Craik John Duncansone Thome narne Johne
talyouris Johne Wilyongsone Robert hay Dauid Srachin richerd hil yongar
and Johne chapman

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne
steuinsone forspekar that mavnys belman sal pay to Williame
blinsellis modir iiijor s' restand' in his handis and caus' hir' to be pait
of xxxij d' assignit to hir of Alexander Sancharis maill be the
said alexander

The saide day Emy Kennartj the wif of Johne talyour Elizibeth
Drum the wif of William Wricht Canny Kyd and cristj prat for his
vyf conuikit be ane Suorne assis' for spilling of the mercat
and brekin of common' ordinance in meilbying' and ilkan of
thame in ane Amerciament of the Court and to Amend as law will
and forber' in tyme to Cum

The x day of October' the yer forsaid' the aldirman and the
Consale present for the tyme chargit William of buchane
baxtar and thome buchane to decist and bak nay breid' for yer and
day becaus' thai refusit to baik and hald the pas' gevin
to thame be the towne

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxjo die
octobris anno quo Supra

head.add: Nomina Inquisicionis Johannis allirdes Jonete betson'

div.p:
Johannes Wormet Willelmus blinsele Dauid mar' Willelmus portar Willelmus
Kintor Dauid Spens Donaldus strathachin Willelmus murray Andreas
lousone cristinus prat alexander prat Jacobus Kennartj Johannes lundoris
gilbertus litstar Johannes Duncansone Johannes tuliboy and gavinus murray
Jurati dicunt quod quondam henricus ruthirfurd frater patris matris
Jonete betsone latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus
ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam
terra siue tenemento Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico nauium
ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram alexandri mar' ex australi
ex vna et terram quondam Andree branche ex boreali Et quod dicta
Joneta est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam henrici
fratris patris matris sue de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime
etatis Et quod dicta terra Cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum quatuor
marcas et valuit xl s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite
de domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium et quod nunc existit in
manibus domini nostri Regis per mortem dicti quondam henrici per spacium
dimidij annj aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis hucusque Jus suum
minime prosequentis

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam henricus ruthirfurd frater patris matris
Johannis allirdes de baddinskoth latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus
et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de quadam
terra siue tenemento Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico nauium ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter teram alexandri mar' ex australi ex vna et
terram quondam Andree branche ex boreali Et quod dictus Johannes est
vnus de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam henrici fratris patris
matris sue de dicta terra Cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et
quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum quatuor marcas et
valuit xl s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in Capite de domino
nostro rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existit in manibus
domini nostri regis per mortem dicti quondam henrici per spacium dimidij
annj aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum hucusque minime
prosequentis
